column4: hello, i'm having a problem. i shut down the computer normally, but it now won't come back into gnome. login page looks fine and i log in, but box that show nautilus and stuff loading never comes up. :(
does anyone know how i can fix this? it is just a blank screen with the brown wallpaper and i can move the mouse, but nothing else happens
did you try the "failsafe gnome" session?
thanks i'll try the failsafe gnome now
